title: Statistic Covid-19
ask_body: If you feel sick with any COVID-19 symptoms, please Pass this test immediately for help
pup_body: Follow the instructions to do your own test.
er_cnx:
verify your connection
swipe down to refresh
er_country:
Something went wrong
swipe down to refresh
pastor_discription:
This algorithm is transferred from the Pasteur Institute according to the latest updates
The purpose of this questionnaire is to direct you only according to your health condition and the symptoms you are reporting. The advice he provides has no medicinal value
error_info: This week contains incomplete information. We apologize for not showing
q1_1: What is the highest temperature during the past 48 hours?
q1_1_b_1: Less than or equal to 35.4 째 C
q1_1_b_4: Greater than or equal to 39 째 C.
q1_2: Do you have a cough or have you changed your usual cough in recent days?
q1_3: Have you noticed a sharp loss or decrease in your taste or smell in the past few days?
q1_4: Have you had a sore throat, muscle pain, muscle aches, or unusual headache in the past few days?
q1_4_1: If you have a headache that does not go away after taking pain relievers (including paracetamol) which you describe as intolerable: contact the urgency.
q1_5: Have you had diarrhea during the past 24 hours (at least 3 loose stools)?
q1_6: Have you been unusually tired in the past few days?
q1_6_1: Does this fatigue force you to rest for more than half of the day?
q1_7: Have you been unable to eat or drink for 24 hours or more?
q1_8: During the past 24 hours, have you noticed shortness of breath when speaking or exerting little effort?
q2_2: What is your weight in kilograms?
q2_3: How tall are you in meters?
q2_4: Do you have a history of cardiovascular disease: complicated high blood pressure (with complications from the heart or kidneys), stroke, coronary heart disease (heart attack), heart surgery, and heart failure with shortness of breath at the slightest exertion?
q2_5: Do you have unbalanced diabetes or suffer from complications (eyes and kidneys)?
q2_6: Do you have active cancer under treatment (except for hormone therapy)?
q2_7: Do you suffer from chronic respiratory diseases (obstructive pulmonary disease, severe asthma, pulmonary fibrosis, sleep apnea syndrome, cystic fibrosis) or do you follow a lung doctor?
q2_8: Do you have a chronic kidney disease that needs dialysis?
q2_9: Do you suffer from cirrhosis of the liver?
q2_10: Are you pregnant in the third trimester of your pregnancy?
q2_11: Do you suffer from sickle cell anemia like me (major form) or have you had a splenectomy (splenectomy) due to sickle cell anemia?
q2_12: Do you suffer from immunosuppression, for example: medicines (anticancer chemotherapy, immunosuppressive therapy, biological therapy and / or corticosteroid therapy with an immunosuppressive dose of more than 15 days); HIV infection uncontrolled or with CD4 <200 / mm3; After a rigid organ or transplantation of hematopoietic stem cells; Linked to pernicious hematopathy during treatment?
